message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is truly exceptional. Given its quality and unique features, I'd like to propose a price of $120 for it. I understand that value perception varies, but I hope you'll find this offer compelling. Looking forward to your response.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I'm looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. While I understand your budget constraints, I would like to counter with an offer of $105. This price reflects the value we place on the product and I hope it aligns more closely with your expectations. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this offer is within your consideration range.
